title: Alessandra Ambrosio puts her pert derriere on display while playing beach volleyball in a bikini
text:
Her breathtaking body made her the queen of the catwalk during her time as a Victoria's Secret Angel.

And Alessandra Ambrosio proved she hadn't changed one bit when she enjoyed a game of beach volleyball in Santa Monica on Saturday.

The Brazilian beauty, 38, flaunted her fabulous figure wearing a cheeky tan swimsuit with a red tied-up tee.

Beach babe: Alessandra Ambrosio looked stellar while playing beach volleyball in Santa Monica on Saturday

While her cheeky bottoms showcased her backside and lean legs, Ale's top put the model's chiseled abs on display.

Shading herself from the sun the catwalk queen topped her look off with a monochrome trucker hat and aviator shades.

She went all out during the game, seen diving into the sand to bump up the ball. During the game she was joined by a pair of hunky male friends.

Alessandra has just been announced as they new face of the Pretty Ballerinas Spring/Summer 2020 campaign.

In stunning promotional shots for the brand, Alessandra looked incredible in a flowing red satin gown which she teamed with a pair of red ballet pumps.

Elsewhere, Alessandra's relationship with beau Nicolo Oddi is heating up as the pair have been nearly inseparable and have been spotted at a number of events.

Alessandra and Alanui founder Nicolo were first linked in July 2018, when they were seen getting close at the HQ2 Nightclub in Atlantic City, according to Page Six.

'The two were very affectionate with each other, kissing and, when she wasn't dancing, they had their arms around each other,' a source told the site at the time.

Prior to her relationship with Nicolo, Alessandra was engaged to the father of her children, Jamie Mazur, 38, for ten years.

The couple split in March of last year, though they reportedly have an amicable relationship due to their two shared children Anja and Noah, six.
